Reviews.Title: “Peaceful”
Reviews.Author: Tallies
Reviews.Content: 6 visited rome weekend stayed hotel loved stocked free fridge missed coffee facilities modern continental breakfast yes quoted staff real asset sport centre steps added bonus outside pool busstop jsut outside takes metro bought 3 day pass bus metro chinese restaurant nearby value money food die fora taxi picked airport airport sunday taxi service recommended roma airport transportation

Reviews.Title: “Beautiful rooms and helpful staff”
Reviews.Author: Lolo24Sydney
Reviews.Content: stop flight extremely impressed size modern clean staff pleasant allowed help drinks fridge provided free 8 soft drinks water fruit juices definitely excellent value money stayed rome night town centre airport hotel approx 20 minutes city airport hotel via public transport breakfast excellent thoroughly enjoyed stay

Reviews.Title: “Be very alert with Laura”

Reviews.Content: simple six beautiful nights 59 till 514 decided stay 2 days genova prior return site price sent email rate arguing didnt site excuses charged amex 36 eur paid expedia notified authorities rome follow suit please doesnt hurt own wonderful

Reviews.Title: “Lovely, stylish hotel, very nice staff members, absolutely happy with my stay there :-)”
